wiki.content: The 911 is A Joke Songfacts says: A common misconception about this song is that it's critical of the police response time in urban black neighborhoods. Actually, it's about the paramedics response time - important distinction. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The 911 is A Joke Songfacts says: A common misconception about this song is that it's critical of the police response time in urban black neighborhoods. Actually, it's about the paramedics response time - important distinction.

track.name: 911 Is a Joke
comments: i like to call 911 as a joke
i like the people that think this song's about 11-sept-01.

Whether it's about police or paramedic response time...it's sad that the song had to even be made. I guess that's one reason why PE and other early rap groups were around, to bring shit like this to light...
A common misconception about this song is that it’s critical of the police response time in urban black neighborhoods. Actually, it’s about the paramedics response time
whoever tagged this as "political" is a fucking dumbass
Public Enemy is right. 911 is a joke especially where I live
I used to think this was 9/11 Is a Joke
CLASSIC TRACK... The video was hilarious and Flav's delivery was perfect... real message brought to the attention of the masses by PE!
I wrote an essay about this song in college.
he still is cool, he was in PUBLIC ENEMY.
Remember when Flav was cool, you guys? [2]
Remember when Flav was cool, you guys?
just one HELLOVA funky bass line driving this thing forward... now stop typing, get up from your computa and DANCE!
